name: Affordable Price
description: My template-based development works efficiently, so I can offer the pricing of 70 - 90% cheaper than the average cost of creating a website through a freelancer.

name: High Performance
description: My websites perform fast and accurately. Speed and accuracy are crucial factors in user experience and search engine optimization.

name: Search Engine Optimization
description: The Search Engine Optimization(SEO) is a process to help search engines like Google to crawl your website better, so the website acquires higher priority in the search results. I follow the best practices when I create my templates so they can obtain more user access from the internet.

name: Responsive Design
description: I designed my templates to adjust to fit different screen sizes so that they render well regardless of the device type.

name: Content Management System
description: The Content Management System(CMS) is software to create and modify digital content. All of my templates are integrated with CMS for you to update your website conveniently.

name: Open Graph Meta Tags
description: Open Graph is an internet protocol to determine how URLs are displayed when shared on social media. My templates come with default Open Graph tags, and you can also modify them through CMS.
